Wisdom: الْإِصْرَارُ يُوجِبُ النَّارَ
enWisdom: Persistence [in sinning] leads one to hellfire

Wisdom: الْإِصْرَارُ أَعْظَمُ حَوْبَةً
enWisdom: Persistence [in sinning] is the gravest of sins

Wisdom: الْإِصْرَارُ يَجْلِبُ النَّقِمَةَ
enWisdom: Disobedience [to Allah] brings retribution

Wisdom: الْمُعَاوَدَةُ إِلَى الذَّنْبِ [لِلذَّنْبِ‏] إِصْرَارٌ
enWisdom: Persistence [in sinning] is the gravest sin and the quickest in [bringing] retribution

Wisdom: الْإِصْرَارُ أَعْظَمُ حَوْبَةً وَأَسْرَعُ عُقُوبَةً
enWisdom: Keeping away from vices is more important [and better] than earning good deeds

Wisdom: التَّهَجُّمُ عَلَى الْمَعَاصِي يُوجِبُ عِقَابَ النَّارِ
enWisdom: When committing sins, recall how the pleasures will [soon] end and the consequences that follow will remain

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْإِصْرَارَ فَإِنَّهُ مِنْ أَكْبَرِ الْكَبَائِرِ وَأَعْظَمِ الْجَرَائِمِ
enWisdom: Refrain from persistence [in committing vices] for it is surely the gravest of great sins and the worst of offences

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ الذُّنُوبِ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ ذَنْبٌ أَصَرَّ عَلَيْهِ عَامِلُهُ
enWisdom: The worst of sins in the sight of Allah is the sin upon which its doer persists

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ الذُّنُوبِ ذَنْبٌ أَصَرَّ عَلَيْهِ صَاحِبُهُ
enWisdom: The gravest of sins is the sin upon which the sinner persists

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ لَيُبْغِضُ الْوَقِحَ الْمُتَجَرِّئَ عَلَى الْمَعَاصِي
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, hates the one who is insolent and bold in committing sins

Wisdom: مَنْ أَصَرَّ عَلَى ذَنْبِهِ اجْتَرَى عَلَى سَخَطِ رَبِّهِ
enWisdom: Whoever takes pleasure in the disobedience of Allah is made to suffer utter humiliation by Allah

Wisdom: مِنَ الْغِرَّةِ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَنْ يُصِرَّ الْمَرْءُ عَلَى الْمَعْصِيَةِ وَيَتَمَنَّى الْمَغْفِرَةَ [الْعِزَّةَ]
enWisdom: When a person persists in sinning and [still] expects to be forgiven, then he is under a delusion about Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: لَا تُصِرَّ عَلَى مَا يُعَقِّبُ الْإِثْمَ
enWisdom: Do not tear your veils [of innocence] in front of the One who knows your secrets

Wisdom: لَا وِزْرَ أَعْظَمُ مِنَ الْإِصْرَارِ
enWisdom: There is no vice greater than rejoicing in acts of depravity

Wisdom: الْمُذْنِبُ عَنْ [عَلَى‏] غَيْرِ عِلْمٍ بَرِي‏ءٌ مِنَ الذَّنْبِ
enWisdom: The weapon of the sinner is repentance

Wisdom: التَّبَجُّحُ بِالْمَعَاصِي أَقْبَحُ مِنْ رُكُوبِهَا
enWisdom: Is there any place of protection or shelter, or any sanctuary or asylum, or any place to flee or return back to?

Wisdom: أَبْغَضُ الْخَلَائِقِ إِلَى اللَّهِ الشَّيْخُ الزَّانِ [الزَّانِي‏]
enWisdom: The most despised of creatures in the sight of Allah is the old adulterer

Wisdom: إِنَّ حِلْمَ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى عَلَى الْمَعَاصِي [إِنَّ حِلْمَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ عَنْكَ‏] جَرَّأَكَ وَبِهَلَكَةِ نَفْسِكَ أَغْرَاكَ
enWisdom: Verily the clemency shown by Allah, the Most High, despite [your] acts of disobedience has made you bold and has driven you to [do things that will] destroy yourself

Wisdom: إِنْ تَنَزَّهُوا عَنِ الْمَعَاصِي يُحْبِبْكُمُ اللَّهُ [يُنْجِكُمُ اللَّهُ‏]
enWisdom: Verily if you keep away from vices you will attain elevated ranks

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنِ اجْتَنَبْتَ السَّيِّئَاتِ نِلْتَ رَفِيعَ الدَّرَجَاتِ
enWisdom: The bane of obedience is insubordination

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ أَقْبَلْتُمْ عَلَى اللَّهِ أُقْبِلْتُمْ وَإِنْ أَدْبَرْتُمْ عَنْهُ أُدْبِرْتُمْ
enWisdom: Verily if you turn towards Allah you have progressed, and if you turn away from Him, you have regressed

Wisdom: آفَةُ الطَّاعَةِ الْعِصْيَانُ
enWisdom: When you commit a sin then be remorseful for it

Wisdom: إِذَا قَلَّتِ الطَّاعَاتُ كَثُرَتِ السَّيِّئَاتُ
enWisdom: When acts of obedience diminish, wrongdoings increase

Wisdom: إِذَا ضَعُفْتَ فَاضْعُفْ عَنْ مَعَاصِي اللَّهِ
enWisdom: When you become weak, then be weak in the disobedience of Allah

Wisdom: تَرْكُ الذَّنْبِ شَدِيدٌ وَأَشَدُّ مِنْهُ تَرْكُ الْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: Giving up sin is difficult, but giving up Paradise is [going to be] more difficult

Wisdom: رُبَّ ذَنْبٍ مِقْدَارُ الْعُقُوبَةِ عَلَيْهِ إِعْلَامُ الْمُذْنِبِ بِهِ
enWisdom: Many a sin is such that the [appropriate] degree of punishment for it is informing the sinner of it
